      • onStop

        public void onStop()

      • checkBlocking

        private java.lang.String checkBlocking(java.lang.Boolean blockChange,
                             java.lang.String script)
        Check to see if blocking preferences have been changed and return appropriate script if they have.
        Parameters:
        blockChange - True if changes have been made, false otherwise.
        script - Current script is passed into the method.
        Returns:
        Updated script is returned.

      • checkLogging

        Check to see if blocking preferences have been changed and return appropriate script if they have.
        Parameters:
        logChange - True if changes have been made, false otherwise.
        script - Current script is passed into the method.
        Returns:
        Updated script is returned.

      • scheduleUpdate

        Parameters:
        cal - Time passed into method.
